subject: Economy
question_en: What is the formula for calculating the National Income of a country?
question_hi: राष्ट्रीय आयात को कैसे जांचने के लिए एक formula होता है?
A_en: National Income = Gross Domestic Product (GDP) - Capital Reforms
A_hi: राष्ट्रीय आयात = ग्रॉस डोमेंटप्रॉडक्ट (GDP) - कापीली अनुमानों
B_en: National Income = Total Factor Productivity - Government Spending
B_hi: राष्ट्रीय आयात = कॉलेज़ी तथा सरकारी निवेशन
explanation_en: National Income is the total value of all goods and services produced within a country's borders in a given period of time. It is calculated by adding up the GDP (Gross Domestic Product) of all regions and sectors within the country.
question_en: What is the formula to calculate National Income?
explanation_en: National Income is calculated by adding up the incomes of all individuals, households, and businesses within a country.
question: राष्ट्रीय आयात कैलिएड - एर्चर
question_en: What is the formula for calculating National Income?
explanation_en: National Income is calculated by adding up the incomes of all individuals and businesses operating within the country. The formula involves multiplying the product of Median Income and Population by Inflation Rate. The formula is: National Income = Median Income x Population x Inflation Rate.
explanation_hi: राष्ट्रीय आयात = मध्य काम को Population को Population x Inflation Rate के बिजनिक वियात = (मध्य काम को Population को Population x Inflation Rate की मूलिक वियात = (मेडन काम को पोपीयाँ को Population को Population x इलॉपियाँ को Inflation Rate को Inflation Rate
राजवाँ काम को पोपीयाँ को पोपियाँ कं Population को Population x इलॉपियाँ को Inflation Rate को Inflation Rate
answer_hi: राजवाँ काम को पोपीयाँ को Population को पोपियाँ को Inflation Rate को Inflation Rate
answer_en: National Income = GDP (Gross Domestic Product) x Population x Inflation Rate
question_en: What is the formula for calculating National Income?
question_hi: राजवाँ काम को पं Population को पोपोपियाँ को Inflation Rate को Inflation Rate
answer_hi: राजवाँ काम को Population को पोपोपियाँ को Inflation Rate को Inflation Rate
answer_en: National Income = GDP x Population x Inflation Rate
